body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News              Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park Fact Sheet - (pdf 143KB)      News Releases      The National Park Service has designated the following fee free days for 2016:  January 18, 2016: Martin Luther King, Jr. Day April 16 through 24, 2016: National Park Week August 1, 2016: Centennial Anniversary of Hawai‘i Volcanoes National Park August 25 through 28, 2016: National Park Service's Birthday - Celebrate all weekend! September 24, 2016: National Public Lands Day  November 11, 2016: Veterans Day  Park entrance fees will be waived on these days.
title: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park: News
